name: v1.10.0
body:
## What's Changed
* osiris_log: Use index skip search for timestamp offset specs by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/195
* Optimizations for readers by @acogoluegnes and @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/192


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/compare/v1.9.0...v1.10.0

name: v1.8.8
body:
## What's Changed

* Set fullsweep_after=0 on the writer process by @mkuratczyk in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/167
* Fix bug in replica chunk acceptance when filters are used. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/187


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/compare/v1.8.7...v1.8.8

name: v1.8.7
body:
## What's Changed
* Remove Bazel-related files by @mkuratczyk in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/181
* Replica: Handle nodedowns when starting replica reader. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/183


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/compare/v1.8.6...v1.8.7

name: v1.8.6
body:
## What's Changed

* Handle a couple of potential errors a bit better by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/174
* osiris_SUITE: Use `$MAKE` if it is defined by @dumbbell in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/178
* Make it possible to configure IP address family for Osiris replica listeners by @michaelklishin in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/177

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/compare/v1.8.5...v1.8.6

name: v1.8.5
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix bug that would delay offset listener notifications. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/173


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/compare/v1.8.4...v1.8.5

name: v1.8.4
body:
## What's Changed
* Ignore unexpected files in the log directory. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/171


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/compare/v1.8.3...v1.8.4

name: v1.8.3
body:
## What's Changed
* osiris_log:overview/1 - fix crash with trailing empty index. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/168


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/compare/v1.8.2...v1.8.3

name: v1.8.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Use the latest method of building the RabbitMQ OCI in actions by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/159
* Correctly handle case where replica exits in handle_continue. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/160
* Add osiris.app.src file by @lukebakken in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/158
* osiris_replica_reader: Stop with `normal` if the leader is already gone during `init/1` by @dumbbell in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/162


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/compare/v1.8.1...v1.8.2

name: v1.8.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Use a new file handle to recover tracking. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/157


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/compare/v1.8.0...v1.8.1

name: v1.8.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Be more defensive when evaluating retention. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/155
* Make writer and replica impl modules pluggable by @dcorbacho in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/156


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/compare/v1.7.2...v1.8.0

name: v1.7.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Calculate the correct chunk size when filters are used. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/154


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/compare/v1.7.1...v1.7.2

name: v1.7.1
body: **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/compare/v1.7.0...v1.7.1

name: v1.7.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Add chunk iterator API to osiris_log by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/151
* Copyright update by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/152
* Better handle data loss in first chunk by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/153


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/compare/v1.6.9...v1.7.0

name: v1.7.0-rc.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Add chunk iterator API to osiris_log by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/151


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/compare/v1.6.9...v1.7.0-rc.1

name: v1.6.9
body:
## What's Changed
* Replica reader should register offset listener on init by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/148


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/compare/v1.6.8...v1.6.9

name: v1.6.8
body:
## What's Changed
* Handle one more case of corrupt files at startup by @gomoripeti in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/142
* Optimise osiris_log:recover_tracking/1 by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/143
* Optimise index scanning by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/144
* Pass SSL options to ssl:listen by @lukebakken in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/147

## New Contributors
* @gomoripeti made their first contribution in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/142
* @lukebakken made their first contribution in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/147

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/compare/v1.6.7...v1.6.8

name: v1.6.7
body: **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/compare/v1.6.6...v1.6.7

name: v1.6.6
body:
## What's Changed
* Replica: stop with '{shutdown, writer_unavailable}' when writer pid is not alive. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/141


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/compare/v1.6.5...v1.6.6

name: v1.6.5
body:
## What's Changed
* Use the additional rabbitmq erlang-packages bzlmod registry by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/138
* Delete folders of deleted replicas by @mkuratczyk in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/139
* Add a workflow that publishes as a bzlmod module by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/140


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/compare/v1.6.4...v1.6.5

name: v1.6.4
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix OCI workflow for rabbitmq-server@main by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/134
* Rename the bazel module to rabbitmq_osiris by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/133
* Use the correct module name for osiris in the oci workflow by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/135
* Use seshat from bazel-central-registry by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/136
* Fix offset reader race condition by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/137


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/compare/v1.6.3...v1.6.4

name: v1.6.3
body:
## What's Changed
* Add a Release workflow that publishes to BCR by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/pull/132


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/osiris/compare/v1.6.2...v1.6.3
